text: The results of the 2007 Little League World Series were determined between August 17 and August 26, 2007 in South Williamsport, Pennsylvania. 16 teams were divided into four groups, two with four teams from the United States and two with four international teams each, playing in a round robin format. In each group, the top two teams advanced to the knockout stage. The last remaining team from the United States faced the last remaining international team for the Little League World Series Championship. {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="7" | Pool play |- !
